name: Love Pong
description:
Love Pong is an arcade Pong game attempting to simulate interaction between two intimate persons via text messaging.

The game is developed by 4 individuals during Level Up KL, SEA Game Jam in Malaysia.

Love Pong is published here as a means to be previewed by potential play-testers and serve itself as a portfolio to everyone involved in it.

Credits
  • Bari Silvestre | Game Designer
  • Alexander Tan Zheng Fang | Artist & Programmer
  • Ong Li Hau | Programmer
  • Terrence Chan Kwok Yin | Programmer
